text:
In this unit we are exploring measurements of two- and three-dimensional shapes and how these measurements are used to solve real world problems. At the end of this Investigation,

What do you know about measurements of two- and three-dimensional shapes?

At this point students can talk add to these ideas to their Investigation 1 thoughts: finding the volume of all right prisms by calculating the area of the base times the height; the volume of right prisms increases as the number of sides increases; and how to create various shapes by slicing a rectangular prism.
